channel.title: Fixing VersionCache (UpdateCache.java)
channel.description:
How to fix VersionCache [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,547045.0/nowap.html]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,547045.0/nowap.html[/url]
Step 1: Create a CacheVersion.txt
Step 2: Added this code on it. [CODE]1.0[/CODE]
Step 3: Upload it on dropbox and you will get this link. [CODE]https://www.dropbox.com/s/1stdrt60gbhjf9w/cacheVersion.txt[/CODE]
Noted!: Remember you need to get the real download link. Go to the link below and right click on download. [CODE]https://www.dropbox.com/s/1stdrt60gbhjf9w/cacheVersion.txt[/CODE]
And you will get this link [CODE]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/1stdrt60gbhjf9w/cacheVersion.txt?token_hash=AAGC9OYwqPgjsyk2MAzcWX k3e1lYo0q4L7Lk9JoIEB4hDw&dl=1[/CODE]
Now you need to remove this thing. token_hash=AAGC9OYwqPgjsyk2MAzcWXk3e1lYo0q4L7Lk9Jo IEB4hDw&dl=1
So you next link will show [CODE]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/1stdrt60gbhjf9w/cacheVersion.txt?[/CODE] Step 4: Now go to you UpdateCache.java and add that link
[CODE]public static final String VERSION_URL = "http://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/1stdrt60gbhjf9w/cacheVersion.txt?";[/CODE] Now you done with it. Have fun with it. Having problem do post.

item.title: Fixing VersionCache (UpdateCache.java)
